document_data.mainbody:
Jannaths Tears were a small chain of islands in the Sea of Swords.
The islands were located between the Moonshae Isles to the west and Baldurs Gate on the Sword Coast to the east.
In the , High King Bayle Carrathal of the Moonshae Isles sent a small fleet to Jannaths Tears with the intent to annex the islands into his kingdom. His forces were sunk by the navy of Baldurs Gate, who came to the Tears defense. Following this embarrassment, Bayle was deposed later that same year and replaced by Yolanda Carrathal, grandniece of his father.
